posting_body: ['Crescent at West Hollywood', '1274 N Crescent Heights Blvd, West Hollywood, CA, 90046', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 26', 'OR Text', '26', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'More unit details at:', '<URL>', 'Apartments in West Hollywood, CA', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 880 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome home to The Crescent at West Hollywood, where convenience and comfort maximize your routine.', 'Our luxury apartments in West Hollywood, CA, have everything you need to step into a life of both ease and sophistication in a place that instantly feels like home.', 'Find plenty of space to call your own with any of our floor plans.', 'Designed with the resident in mind, our community features a saltwater pool, fire pit, barbecue lounge, and fitness center to enhance daily urban living.', 'With close access to restaurants, shops, parks, and entertainment, you can step into the local lifestyle right outside your door.', 'Grab a bite or your favorite brew at Coffee Dose, Laurel Hardware, or Connie & Ted’s, and fall in love with our friendly community.', 'Come home to The Crescent at West Hollywood and come home to better living.', 'Schedule a tour today!', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Saturday: 9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'K65A7uua']
